sentence.Network_en: Re-apply sunscreen every two hours, especially if you have been swimming.
sentence.Network_cn: 每两个小时重新涂一次防晒油，尤其是在游泳的时候。

sentence.Network_en: Sunscreen can lose its potency if left over winter in the bathroom cabinet.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果把防晒霜在盥洗室的壁橱里放一个冬天，就有可能失效。

sentence.Network_en: I use a sunscreen whenever there is even a remote possibility that I will be in the sun.
sentence.Network_cn: 不论何时只要有一点可能暴露在阳光下，我就会用防晒霜。

entry.def: A sunscreen is a cream that protects your skin from the sun's rays, especially in hot weather.

means.word_mean: 1. a cream spread on the skin; contains a chemical (as PABA) to filter out ultraviolet light and so protect from sunburn

auth_sentence.content: Hats and sunscreen are also a must for skin protection.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hats and sunscreen are also a must for skin protection.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hats and sunscreen are also a must for skin protection.
